us.title: Who we are
us.description: Umbra is a group project for the end of the degree, formed by a group of students with diverse profiles, ranging from audiovisual to multimedia. Our motivation to do this project came from the possibility of joining the different areas in an avant-garde format.

project.title: The project
project.description: Umbra consists of an interactive online storytelling, a presentation-like installation and a promotional teaser. These three media allow the main web platform to be visualized with a wide previous knowledge of the project.

narrative.title: The narrative
narrative.description: The online narrative deals, in an abstract and subtle way, with the importance of data control in the near future, and the repercussions that these will generate in our daily lives. The aim of the project is to create a reflection and to make the viewer aware of the transcendence of the data, while enjoying the interactive.

data.title: Your data
data.description: To calculate the value of the data, we have taken into account different factors. The first of these is age, along with your current geoposition and we have also taken into account some decisions you have made during the narrative. From this information we have contrasted it with a set of scientific studies, where the objective was to make an estimate of what the value of the data would be in a few years time.
